title: Acid blob
data:

*For a list of all jellies, see [list of jellies](/List_of_jellies "List of jellies").*

| acid blob J [![Acid blob.png](/images/2/2c/Acid_blob.png)](/File:Acid_blob.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |

| [AC](/Armour_class "Armour class")                                              | 1                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |

| [Will](/Willpower "Willpower")                                                  | 160                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| Attack1                                                                         | 42 ([hit](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [acid](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                         | [rPois+](/Poison "Poison") [rAcid+++](/Acid "Acid") [rDrown](/Asphyxiation "Asphyxiation")                                                                                                                                                                               |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                               | None                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                     |

| Flags                                                                           | [Destroys doors](/Category:Eats_doors "Category:Eats doors") [See invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible") [Unbreathing](/Unbreathing "Unbreathing") [Unblindable](/Blind "Blind") [Acidic flesh](/Acidic_flesh "Acidic flesh") [Web immune](/Web_immune "Web immune") |

|   |                                                              |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | A lump of sickly pustulent flesh, dripping with lethal acid. |

## Useful Info

**Acid blobs** are fast, [acidic](/Acid "Acid") monsters with highly accurate ranged and melee attacks that can [corrode](/Corrode "Corrode") your armour and weapons. They deal enough damage that fragile characters should be more concerned about their [HP](/HP "HP"). They can be found in [the Slime Pits](/The_Slime_Pits "The Slime Pits").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                            |                                                      |
| :---------- | ------------------------------------------ | ---------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Spit Acid](/Spit_Acid "Spit Acid") (3d14) | [Natural flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- [Resist corrosion](/Resist_corrosion "Resist corrosion") reduces their damage output considerably and helps defend against the [corroded](/Corrode "Corrode") status.
- The Slime Pits aren't exactly easy to bottleneck enemies in, but if you can use [walls](/Wall "Wall") or other enemies to keep acid blobs from shooting you while you move into combat range, it'll help.
- Even with some form of acid resistance, these are still fast monsters that hit hard in melee: turn-for-turn, they have similar damage output to [stone giants](/Stone_giant "Stone giant"). Prepare accordingly.
- They have terrible defenses. Low-accuracy spells such as [Iron Shot](/Iron_Shot "Iron Shot") are quite effective against them.

Acid blob

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.27: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all jellies, see list of jellies.

acid blob J 
HP 65-132
HD 18
XP 2426
Speed 12
AC 1
EV 3
Will 160
Attack1 42 (hit: acid)


Resistances rPois+
rAcid+++
rDrown
Vulnerabilities None
Habitat Land
Intelligence Brainless
Uses Uses nothing
Holiness Natural
Size Small
Type jelly, acid blob
Flags Destroys doors
See invisible
Unbreathing
Unblindable
Acidic flesh
Web immune
A lump of sickly pustulent flesh, dripping with lethal acid.

Useful Info

Acid blobs are fast, acidic monsters with highly accurate ranged and melee attacks that can corrode your armour and weapons. They deal enough damage that fragile characters should be more concerned about their HP. They can be found in the Slime Pits.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Spit Acid (3d14) Natural flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Resist corrosion reduces their damage output considerably and helps defend against the corroded status.
  • The Slime Pits aren't exactly easy to bottleneck enemies in, but if you can use walls or other enemies to keep acid blobs from shooting you while you move into combat range, it'll help.
  • Even with some form of acid resistance, these are still fast monsters that hit hard in melee: turn-for-turn, they have similar damage output to stone giants. Prepare accordingly.
  • They have terrible defenses. Low-accuracy spells such as Iron Shot are quite effective against them.
